Package org.ietf.nea.pt.socket.simple

IETF socket transport connection implementation.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultAuthenticationClient
    Default authentication implementation for a NAR.
    DefaultAuthenticationServer
    Default authentication implementation for a NAA.
    DefaultBatchReceiver
    Default message receiver for a transport connection.
    DefaultNegotiationInitiator
    Default version negotiation implementation for the initiator of a transport connection.
    DefaultNegotiationResponder
    Default version negotiation implementation for responder in a the version negotiation phase of a transport connection.
    DefaultSocketTransportConnection
    Transport connection with an underlying Socket.
    DefaultSocketTransportConnectionBuilder
    Builder to create a TransportConnection based on an underlying socket.
    DefaultSocketWrapper
    Wrapper to encapsulate a socket and mask its functions for the transmission and receipt of TNC messages thru the contained socket and for the management of the contained socket.
